resources.string: For using the %1$s tool authentication is required. Press the button below to access your Google account and begin to use the tool.
Looks like you don\'t have any activated tool. Press the button below to go to the tools list.
If you already have it, input the INR value provided by your doctor. (This value could be set when the control day comes)
Remember to take your dose today: {0} {1}
Today is control day. Remember to write down the INR value provided by your doctor.
Looks like you don\'t have a configured treatment yet.\n\nPress the button below and configure it as soon as possible.
There is no data available for the moment.\n\nPlease, come back when you have done your first control.
